text:
Long overdue review.

I first saw Dr Edwin when he was working at another clinic. Dr Edwin was easygoing and knowledgeable. When I was looking to make another appointment with him, I saw he had set up RMDY clinic and didn't hesitate to book an appointment there. Amazingly, he remembered my name and kept my record. Dr Edwin is always happy to answer questions/concerns and is very passionate about preventive care.

Dr. Edwin is knowledgeable and super nice. He's really easy to talk to and makes kids feel at ease during check-ups. He knows just the right way to keep kids and old folks calm. He goes the extra mile to ask more questions and dig deeper.

He asks about our medical history with great care and spots those little red flags for us. We really appreciate his professional approach and highly recommend Dr. Edwin's clinic.

First time visiting and will be back! Doctor Edwin is really knowledgeable, he explained everything to me from the cause of my visit to the medications he would he prescribing.

Clinic is located at cozy corner in the heart of Katong. Entire experience was pleasant and staff who were quick to serve and help!

Will recommend to my friends and family
I loved how kind and accommodating everyone was before during and after the surgery. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone looking for a professional and comprehensive medical sercive!
Dr Edwin is very knowledgeable and professional. Had a pleasant experience in this clinic.
